title: Popilush Long Sleeve Maxi Dress Bodycon Cocktail Dress Shapewear Tummy Control Fall Formal Dresses Built-in Bra
description: SIZE TIPS: Please refer to the size chart to ensure an accurate fit. Measure your waist, bust, and hips to find your size. If you are between sizes, please choose a larger size. Shapewear may seem small and tight, so be patient when putting it on

8 IN 1 DESIGN DETAILS: The non-compressive butt design creates a peach butt, Mesh lining is designed to sculpt the thigh contour, Adjustable straps for a truly fit, detachable cups provide you with versatile wearing methods, the abdominal double layer design can smooth your abdomen, outer fitted dress is a good way to highlight your fashion taste, shaping bodysuit underneath can create a lovely figure

SOFT MODAL FABRIC: The outer long sleeve maxi dress is made of soft modal fabric, it is made from regenerative plants, the touch feeling is more comfortable and the fabric has good elasticity, we recommend purchasing one size up

UNIQUE BUILT IN SHAPEWEAR DESIGN: This isn’t just an ordinary long sleeve bodycon dress, it's a fitted dress with built-in shapewear, In this way, you only need to wear our bodycon dress, which is equivalent to the effect of other people wearing bodysuits under dresses, and our dress with built in shapewear can be more comfortable, creating a lovely hourglass figure for you in just a step
COMFORTABLE FABRIC OF INNER SHAPER: The inner shapewear is made with mesh fabric, stretchy and sweat-absorbent, let your skin breathe fresh air freely, comfortable enough to wear all day
